_header: Well were him that wist / To whom he might trust

BodRawD328.Transcription: Well were hym þat wystto wam he myst tryst
BodRawD328.Note:
Translating ‘Euax qui si ret…’, which precedes;
                    English portion all written on one line.
BodRawD328.Editions:
Meech,  Sanford Brown. 
             “A Collection of Proverbs in Rawlinson MS D 328.” 
             Modern Philology
         38 (1940-41): 113-32: 125.

BodDou52.Transcription:
Welle were hym þat to wham he myȝht tristAnd so were hym
                    þat knew false fro þe trewe
BodDou52.Editions:
Förster,  Max. 
             “Die Mittelenglische Sprichwörtersammlung in Douce 52.” 
             Festschrift zum XII Deutschen Neuphilolgentage in München
                1906.
            E. Stollreither, ed. 
         Erlangen (1906): 40-64: 46.
